containsTextTooltip.message: E.g. 'google.com' means all pages that url contains 'google.com' like https://www.google.com, https://www.google.com/abc, https://xyz.google.com

importDescription.message: Import Bookmarks from current browser to BitSky. Import will not delete your browser bookmarks, if a bookmark need to login or connect VPN, it maybe failed to import.

importHistoryDescription.message: Import browser history to BitSky. Import will not delete your browser history, if a history need to login  or connect VPN, it maybe failed to import.

importHistoryDetail.message: Import passed $1 days browser history, and max import $2 records

searchDescription.message: Search bookmarks or pages by title, url, tags, content

savePageDescription.message: Save current page without add a browser bookmark

bookmarkPageDescription.message: Bookmark current page will save page also add a browser bookmark

tooltipBookmarked.message: Click to remove bookmark current page

failed.message: Failed, will auto retry in background

serviceNotHealthTitle.message: Unable to connect to the Bitsky desktop application

serviceNotHealthDetail.message: Please ensure that the BitSky desktop application is currently running. If the application is running, please allow a few moments for the connection to establish. If you still encounter this message after a brief wait, kindly consider restarting the BitSky desktop application
